document.full_text: the global commodities trader and miner priced its initial public offering at between 480 pence and 580 pence per share, a range that puts its midpoint value at $60.1 billion.
document.title: glencore sets i.p.o. range, valuing it at $60 billion
lines_and_colors: the global commodities trader and miner priced its initial public offering at between 480 pence and 580 pence per share, a range that puts its midpoint value at $60.1 billion.
